title: New player wanting to improve
body:
Hey guys I've been playing for around 2 months now and wouldn't mind someone playing a long with me and giving some constructive criticism (you can be harsh).  I keep making new accounts because I feel like I won't stand a chance against higher level players, which I assume will be more experienced. But I plan on just sticking it out on one account now and eventually getting it to ranked games, but not until I know I won't be ruining anyone else games. Also if anyone else new is reading this add me and we can improve together.
Cheers for taking a look lads.
IGN Gandalf Sax Guy

replies.body:
Hey there, 
I would be interested in playing with you if possible.
add me TRISS22

Hi there Gandalf Sax Guy!

I represent a discord based gaming community with over 500+ members ranging from the depths of Bronze to the top 20 on the server, I saw your post and thought that you might be interested in what we have to offer. We do coaching, analysis, ranked teams, structured tournaments, etc. If coaching is what you're after, we have people who can help you. Discord link is below, join anytime! 
https://discord.gg/DwUMNDQ

While you're waiting for a partner to learn from, I highly encourage you check out these quick training videos https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9RdXhXESRJzgY_SwHB8T-cZxXljWhQvz

There's something for everyone :)
These are great, thanks! Didn't come across them while I've been lurking through youtube guides.
Yeah I wish they had more visibility. For me they are actually the best tutorials/guides around.
